mapper.insert: insert into t_product ( P_Name, Product_Type_Code, Summary, Description, Price, Member_Price, Create_Date, Update_Date, IsOnShelves, Pic) values ( #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memberPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isonshelves,jdbcType=BIT}, #{pic,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
